room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Philadelphia in Philadelphia
review: We had so much fun. The staff was extremely friendly and encouraging! The Playground Game is a thought provoking adventure. I would highly recommend a visit to this brand new experience at the King of Prussia Mall.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Philadelphia in Philadelphia
review: I had an amazing time! The staff was very friendly and helpful...they even gave me a birthday card signed by all members of the team. That was so thoughtful of them and much appreciated. I'll be back for sure!!!
